pages.title: Fusion Bomb
pages.text: $(bold)You have become death... destroyer of worlds.$() Stack nose->tail: ordinance_fission_initiator_head, ordinance_inline_fusion_warhead_stage_2, ordinance_inline_fusion_warhead_stage_1, ordinance_core, ordinance_fins. Needs 6x implosion_lens and 1x fission_core installed to arm; a fuze is required. Place horizontally with the initiator forward.

pages.name: Layout
pages.text: Left to right = tail to nose. Fins (T), core (C), fusion stage 1 (0), fusion stage 2 (F), initiator (I). Install lenses and fission core before arming.
